trans-unit.source: Applying the optional SoapDocumentServiceAttribute to an XML Web service sets the default format of SOAP requests and responses sent to and from XML Web service methods within the XML Web service.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute"></xref> class setting all properties to their default values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute"></xref> class setting the parameter formatting.
The parameter formatting of the XML Web service.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute"></xref> class that sets the parameter formatting and sets whether parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element, under the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Body" name="Body" href=""></xref> element, in SOAP messages.

Sets whether parameters are encapsulated within a single XML element, under the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Body" name="Body" href=""></xref> element, in SOAP messages sent to and from XML Web service methods within the XML Web service.

Gets or sets the default setting that controls whether parameters are encapsulated within a single element following the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Body>" name="<Body>" href=""></xref> element in the XML portion of a SOAP message for XML Web service methods of the XML Web service.
The default <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle"></xref> for SOAP requests and SOAP responses to and from XML Web service methods within the XML Web service.
If not set, the default is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle"></xref>.
Gets or sets how SOAP messages are routed to the XML Web service.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServiceRoutingStyle"></xref> that represents how SOAP messages are routed to the XML Web service.
Gets or sets the default parameter formatting for an XML Web service.
The default <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"></xref> for the XML Web service.
If not set, the default is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"></xref>.
